resources.string:
Simple app to force set refresh rate. Thanks to Max Weinbach for finding this tweak and Rohit Shetty (TechyLogy YT) for testing this app.
Developed by @SatySatsZB #hex_ installer

This version is modified by JD Ros for Note 20 series

This app also includes QS tiles for changing the refresh rates. Check in your QuickSettings Panel

You can confirm the current FPS on the top right corner of this app. Refresh rate will go back to 60 when screen isnt touched for 5 secs and nothing is moving. 

 If the refresh rate indicator at the top goes haywire like 200fps or something, just restart the app or go to DisplayHz.com
